name: Passwordy
tagline: A password generator with a PyQt5 GUI.
body:
# Passwordy A tool to generate passwords with a QT GUI.

## Installation Get PyQT5: pip install pyqt5 Download or clone the repo. ## Usage Run the script: python passwordy.py Choose your settings:

Try different options (multiple choices can be made at one time).

Click the generate button and generate your passwords!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
